titles.title: ChiPACC Act of 2008
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide an option of States to cover a children's program of all-inclusive coordinated care (ChiPACC) under the Medicaid Program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1824-1825)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
9/17/2008--Introduced.
ChiPACC Act of 2008 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to give states the option of covering a children's program of all-inclusive coordinated care (ChiPACC).
